required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: CARbon monoxidE intoxiCatiOn in Korea: Prospective Cohort (CARE CO Cohort)
clinical_study.official_title: CARbon monoxidE intoxiCatiOn in Korea: Prospective Cohort (CARE CO Cohort)

brief_summary.textblock: This prospective cohort study enrolls subjects who experience carbon monoxide (CO) poisoning. The purpose of the study is to evaluate therapeutic effects of various treatments and short and long-term outcomes in CO poisoned patients. In addition, complications of brain and heart susceptible to CO are investigated through various ways and the association between complications and the patient's prognosis is also investigated. All subjects will be regularly monitored by physicians participating in this study.

detailed_description.textblock: This prospective cohort study enrolls subjects who experience CO poisoning. The purpose of the study is to evaluate therapeutic effects of various treatments, including hyperbaric oxygen therapy (HBO), therapeutic hypothermia (TH), and additional drugs, and short and long-term outcomes, such as neurocognitive sequelae or mortality, in CO poisoned patients. In addition, complications of brain and heart susceptible to CO are investigated through a variety of ways, such as magnetic resonance image (MRI), computed tomography (CT), ultrasound, and laboratory test, and the association between various complications and the patient's prognosis is also investigated. All subjects will be regularly monitored by physicians participating in this study.

primary_outcome.measure: Therapeutic response to HBO at 1 month
primary_outcome.description: Therapeutic response to HBO according to times from rescue to first HBO and frequency and pressure of HBO at 1 month after CO exposure

primary_outcome.measure: Therapeutic response to HBO at 6 months
primary_outcome.description: Therapeutic response to HBO according to times from rescue to first HBO and frequency and pressure of HBO at 6 months after CO exposure

primary_outcome.measure: Predictors and model development for participants with poor outcome including mortality, and neurocognitive and psychological sequelae at 1 month after CO exposure evaluated by such as neurocognitive function tests
primary_outcome.description: Predictors and model development for poor outcome including mortality, and neurocognitive and psychological sequelae at 1 month after CO exposure evaluated by tools, such as global deterioration scale (GDS) or Carbon Monoxide Neuropsychological Screening Battery (CONSB), etc, through variables, such as clinical features, laboratory tests, or imaging study that can be investigated within 1 month

primary_outcome.measure: Predictors and model development for participants with poor outcome including mortality, and neurocognitive and psychological sequelae at 6 months after CO exposure evaluated by such as neurocognitive function tests
primary_outcome.description: Predictors and model development for poor outcome including mortality, and neurocognitive and psychological sequelae at 6 months after CO exposure evaluated by tools, such as global deterioration scale (GDS) or Carbon Monoxide Neuropsychological Screening Battery (CONSB), etc, through variables, such as clinical features, laboratory tests, or imaging study that can be investigated within 1 month

primary_outcome.measure: Predictors and model development for participants with poor outcome including mortality, and neurocognitive and psychological sequelae at 12 months after CO exposure evaluated by such as neurocognitive function tests
primary_outcome.description: Predictors and model development for poor outcome including mortality, and neurocognitive and psychological sequelae at 12 months after CO exposure evaluated by tools, such as global deterioration scale (GDS) or Carbon Monoxide Neuropsychological Screening Battery (CONSB), etc, through variables, such as clinical features, laboratory tests, or imaging study that can be investigated within 1 month

secondary_outcome.description: Therapeutic response to HBO according to times from rescue to first HBO and frequency and pressure of HBO at 12 months after CO exposure

secondary_outcome.measure: Therapeutic response to TH combined with HBO at 1 month
secondary_outcome.description: Therapeutic response to TH combined with HBO in acute severe CO poisoning at 1 month after CO exposure

secondary_outcome.measure: Therapeutic response to TH combined with HBO at 6 months
secondary_outcome.description: Therapeutic response to TH combined with HBO in acute severe CO poisoning at 6 months after CO exposure

secondary_outcome.measure: Therapeutic response to TH combined with HBO at 12 months
secondary_outcome.description: Therapeutic response to TH combined with HBO in acute severe CO poisoning at 12 months after CO exposure

secondary_outcome.description: Therapeutic response to HBO according to presence of apolipoprotein E4 genotype at 6 months after CO exposure

secondary_outcome.measure: Therapeutic response to HBO according to presence of apolipoprotein E4 at 12 months after CO exposure
secondary_outcome.description: Therapeutic response to HBO according to presence of apolipoprotein E4 genotype at 12 months after CO exposure

secondary_outcome.description: Cardiac injury related to CO poisoning evaluated by cardiac MRI in acute phase

secondary_outcome.measure: Organ injury related to CO poisoning
secondary_outcome.description: Organ injury, such as lung, kidney, liver, pancreas, or bowel, etc, related to CO poisoning

secondary_outcome.measure: Complications related to CO poisoning
secondary_outcome.description: Complications, such as pulmonary thromboembolism or rhabdomyolysis, etc, related to CO poisoning

secondary_outcome.measure: Effect of HBO for delayed neurocognitive and psychological dysfunction at 1 year after onset
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Within 1 year after delayed neurocognitive and psychological sequelae onset
secondary_outcome.description: Effect of HBO for patient with delayed neurocognitive and psychological sequelae at 1 year after sequelae onset

secondary_outcome.measure: Effect of HBO for delayed neurocognitive and psychological dysfunction at 2 years after onset
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Within 2 years after delayed neurocognitive and psychological sequelae onset
secondary_outcome.description: Effect of HBO for patient with delayed neurocognitive and psychological sequelae at 2 years after sequelae onset

secondary_outcome.measure: Validation of methods evaluating neurocognitive and psychological outcomes
secondary_outcome.description: Validation of methods evaluating neurocognitive and psychological outcomes within 6 months

arm_group.description: A diagnosis of CO poisoning is made according to medical history and carboxyhemoglobin >5% (>10% in smokers).

intervention.description: Cardiac MRI be taken to CO poisoned patients Cardiac CT be taken to CO poisoned patients TTE be taken to CO poisoned patients Brain MRI be taken to CO poisoned patients Neurocognitive function tests be taken to CO poisoned patients Laboratory tests be taken to CO poisoned patients
Hyperbaric oxygen therapy be used for CO poisoned patients Therapeutic hypothermia be used for CO poisoned patients

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Acute CO poisoning
Exclusion Criteria:
- Declined to enrollment in the study
